p: According to Ayurvedic literature and practices, A. calamus plant extract was prescribed for several problems related to digestion, insomnia, epilepsy, cough, fever, and neurosis. The active compounds of this plant were reportedly involved in the acetylcholinesterase degradation [ 56]. Studies have shown that A. calamus is an effective source of medication that can help in preventing memory impairment or increasing memory by stress reduction by controlling inflammation and reactive oxygen species [ 57]. Indicating that the plant can be a potential candidate for AD therapeutics.
